name: BlindDragonFight
description:
Blind Dragon Fight is an android game designed to be playable by blind people. Locate the dragon and what it is doing using spatial sound, parry when it attacks and shoot arrows to hunt it. The tutorial is fully sound and interactive.  Headphones or earphones are required to play.

    The game is currently only available on Android, but I can make it playable for computers too, just let me know in comments if you need it ! :)
